Back Next Enter a name to associate this mobile device to your FindU account. Add photo Name Phone number Register

Successful registration. End
Please wait, just a moment… Please wait… Please verify your email. Password must be 8 character length Please set WiFI Off. Please verify your password and remember it must have 8 character length both numbers and letters. Name must have 1 to 15 characters…" Check your code … … is just a moment. There are no licenses to register the device.
Please verify your internet connection. adtfindu token Tracking Click here to see map Pulsator image description Olivia is with you Return Start Finalizer
// TODO added by PS for PocketSphinx Library testing To start demonstration say \"oh mighty computer\". Say \"digits\", \"forecast\" or \"phones\" to choose the grammar, language model or phonetic decoder example. To try recognition of digits: say something like \"one two three four five\". To try recognition of a weather forecast like \"sunny spells on Wednesday\". To try phonetic recognition say anything.
Listening… Internet is not enabled Please provide microphone permissions Unknown error Unable to add speech progress view Confirm Retry I\'m here! If you are in danger say the word: Ayuda! You do not have an address set up. Contact our ADT support Try again when you are closer to your home. Hi, I\'m Olivia I will accompany you on your return home .
